verses.verse: Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto me, Though <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, yet my <S%H5315>mind<s%> could not be toward this <S%H5971>people<s%>: cast them <S%H7971>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>, and let them go <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if they <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, Whither shall we go <S%H3318>forth<s%>? then thou shalt <S%H559>tell<s%> them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Such as are for <S%H4194>death<s%>, to <S%H4194>death<s%>; and such as are for the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and such as are for the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, to the <S%H7458>famine<s%>; and such as are for the <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, to the <S%H7628>captivity<s%>.

And I will <S%H6485>appoint<s%> over them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4940>kinds<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%>, and the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> to <S%H5498>tear<s%>, and the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to <S%H398>devour<s%> and <S%H7843>destroy<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>cause<s%> them to be <S%H2189%H2113>removed<s%> into all <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H1558>because<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, for that which he <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
For who shall have <S%H2550>pity<s%> upon thee, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>? or who shall <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> thee? or who shall go <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7592>ask<s%> how thou <S%H7965>doest<s%>?

Thou hast <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou art <S%H3212>gone<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>: therefore will I stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against thee, and <S%H7843>destroy<s%> thee; I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> with <S%H5162>repenting<s%>.

And I will <S%H2219>fan<s%> them with a <S%H4214>fan<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; I will <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them of children, I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, since they <S%H7725>return<s%> not from their <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

Their <S%H490>widows<s%> are <S%H6105>increased<s%> to me above the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>: I have <S%H935>brought<s%> upon them against the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the young <S%H970>men<s%> a <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday<s%>: I have caused him to <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon it <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>, and <S%H928>terrors<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

She that hath <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H535>languisheth<s%>: she hath given <S%H5301>up<s%> the <S%H5315>ghost<s%>; her <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>gone<s%> down while it was yet <S%H3119%H3117>day<s%>: she hath been <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%>: and the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of them will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ <S%H188>Woe<s%> is me, my <S%H517>mother<s%>, that thou hast <S%H3205>borne<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7379>strife<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4066>contention<s%> to the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>! I have neither lent on <S%H5383>usury<s%>, nor men have lent to me on <S%H5383>usury<s%>; yet every one of them doth <S%H7043>curse<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3808%H518>Verily<s%> it shall be <S%H2896>well<s%> with thy <S%H8281%H8293>remnant<s%>; <S%H518>verily<s%> I will cause the <S%H341>enemy<s%> to <S%H6293>entreat<s%> thee well in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> and in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction<s%>.
Shall <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7489>break<s%> the <S%H6828>northern<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> and the <S%H5178>steel<s%>?

Thy <S%H2428>substance<s%> and thy <S%H214>treasures<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H957>spoil<s%> without <S%H4242>price<s%>, and that for all thy <S%H2403>sins<s%>, even in all thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>.

And I will make thee to <S%H5674>pass<s%> with thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not: for a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, which shall <S%H3344>burn<s%> upon you.

¶ O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>: <S%H2142>remember<s%> me, and <S%H6485>visit<s%> me, and <S%H5358>revenge<s%> me of my <S%H7291>persecutors<s%>; take me not <S%H3947>away<s%> in thy <S%H639%H750>longsuffering<s%>: <S%H3045>know<s%> that for thy sake I have <S%H5375>suffered<s%> <S%H2781>rebuke<s%>.

Thy <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%>, and I did <S%H398>eat<s%> them; and thy <S%H1697>word<s%> was unto me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>rejoicing<s%> of mine <S%H3824>heart<s%>: for I am <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

I <S%H3427>sat<s%> not in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7832>mockers<s%>, nor <S%H5937>rejoiced<s%>; I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: for thou hast <S%H4390>filled<s%> me with <S%H2195>indignation<s%>.

Why is my <S%H3511>pain<s%> <S%H5331>perpetual<s%>, and my <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H605>incurable<s%>, which <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed<s%>? wilt thou be altogether unto me as a <S%H391>liar<s%>, and as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that <S%H539>fail<s%>?

¶ Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, If thou <S%H7725>return<s%>, then will I bring thee <S%H7725>again<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: and if thou take <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3368>precious<s%> from the <S%H2151>vile<s%>, thou shalt be as my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: let them <S%H7725>return<s%> unto thee; but <S%H7725>return<s%> not thou unto them.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee unto this <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%>: and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> against thee, but they shall not <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against thee: for I am with thee to <S%H3467>save<s%> thee and to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked<s%>, and I will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> thee out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%>.
